Sentencas: Directly using methane in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) requires the knowledge of the reaction of methane over the anode.
Titulo: Reactions of low and middle concentration dry methane over Ni/YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The reactions of low and middle concentration dry methane were studied over the anode of solid oxide fuel cell with Ni/yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) anode and YSZ electrolyte.
Titulo: Reactions of low and middle concentration dry methane over Ni/YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The production rates of different types of gas at anode outlet were measured at different current density.
Titulo: Reactions of low and middle concentration dry methane over Ni/YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Mass balance and relationships between production rates and reaction rates were used to analyze the chemical and electrochemical reactions that took place in parallel.
Titulo: Reactions of low and middle concentration dry methane over Ni/YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: When dry methane is in low concentration, methane decomposition and deposited carbon oxidation occurs at low current density with the overall reaction being partial oxidation of methane (POM).
Titulo: Reactions of low and middle concentration dry methane over Ni/YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: With increased cur-rent density, hydrogen oxidation and carbon monoxide oxidizing to carbon dioxide take place simultaneously, and the overall reaction becomes the direct oxidation of methane (DOM).
Titulo: Reactions of low and middle concentration dry methane over Ni/YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: When DOM occurs, a portion of methane participates the POM.
Titulo: Reactions of low and middle concentration dry methane over Ni/YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: However, the rate of POM decreases with increased current density.
Titulo: Reactions of low and middle concentration dry methane over Ni/YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: At medium methane concentration, only partial oxidation of methane takes place.
Titulo: Reactions of low and middle concentration dry methane over Ni/YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Carbon deposition was found in all the tests across the concentration range investigated.
Titulo: Reactions of low and middle concentration dry methane over Ni/YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cell
